Package kademlia

Class JKademliaNode

java.lang.Object
kademlia.JKademliaNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
KademliaNode
public class JKademliaNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements KademliaNode
The main Kademlia Node on the network, this node manages everything for this local system.
Since:
20140215

  • Constructor Details

    • JKademliaNode

      public JKademliaNode​(java.lang.String ownerId, Node localNode, int udpPort, KademliaDHT dht, KademliaRoutingTable routingTable, KadConfiguration config) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a Kademlia DistributedMap using the specified name as filename base. If the id cannot be read from disk the specified defaultId is used. The instance is bootstraped to an existing network by specifying the address of a bootstrap node in the network.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The Name of this node used for storage
      localNode - The Local Node for this Kad instance
      udpPort - The UDP port to use for routing messages
      dht - The DHT for this instance
      config -
      routingTable -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while reading id or local map from disk or a network error occurred while attempting to bootstrap to the network

    • JKademliaNode
